headline: Show HN: Prodscape.net – Map your mobile app
description:
Hello HN,

Long-time lurker, first-time poster here. I've created a service that creates a "flow map" of your mobile app.

Check it out at: https://prodscape.net.

The goal is to reduce last-minute regressions, promote holistic discussion, and help develop more ownership within an organization. This is something that I would have liked to have had when I was working at a big company.

Some caveats:

  1.) Only iOS is currently supported but Android-support will be coming soon.
  2.) You need a developer-signed IPA file (see the guide on creating an IPA file here: https://prodscape.net/finding-ipa.html).
I would appreciate your thoughts on:

  1.) your barriers to trying it
  2.) your impressions of the map
  3.) whether you're interested in applying this within your team
  4.) anything else.
Don't have access to an IPA file? Email me at illahi@prodscape.net and I will send you one to try.

Thanks!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: Prodscape.net - 绘制您的移动应用地图
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: Prodscape.net - 繪製您的移動應用地圖
description_zh-Hans:
你好，

长期的潜伏者，第一次在这里发帖。我创建了一个服务，可以为你的移动应用创建一个"流程图"。

请查看。https://prodscape.net。

目标是减少最后一分钟的倒退，促进整体讨论，并帮助在一个组织内发展更多的所有权。This is something that I would have liked to have had when I was working at a big company.

Some caveats:

 1.) Only iOS is currently supported but Android-support will be coming soon.
  2.) You need a developer-signed IPA file (see the guide on creating an IPA file here: https://prodscape.net/finding-ipa.html).
I would appreciate your thoughts on:

 1.) your barriers to trying it
  2.) 你对该地图的印象
  3.) whether you're interested in applying this within your team
  4.) anything else.
Don't have access to an IPA file? Email me at illahi@prodscape.net and I will send you one to try.

Thanks!
